TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 46
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Governor of Coahuila and Texas, 06-02-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Governor of Coahuila and Texas, June 2, 1828. Applying for contract to settle the coast of Texas. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: From Translations of Empresario Contracts, p. 153, General Land Office of Texas,
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 46

text.body:
